title: We're Hiring |Instagram Content Creation & Publishing, also contacting people
salary: $600 or more depending on your ability
job_overview:
Responsibilities:
1. Create high-quality, engaging content tailored for Instagram
2. Post content regularly (may occasionally post to our other media platforms as well)
3. Handle communication and basic contact management via DMs and comments

Requirements:
1. Proven ability to create quality content (samples or portfolio preferred)
2. Must have your own Instagram account that is at least 1 year old (You may need to use it while working)
3. Strong communication and time-management skills
